doc:
Colin Welland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colin_Welland 0 Colin Welland (4 July 1934 – 2 November 2015), born Colin Edward Williams, was a British actor and screenwriter. He won the Academy Award for Best Original Screenplay for his script for Chariots of Fire (1981). He won a BAFTA Award for his performance as the empathetic teacher Mr Farthing in the 1969 film Kes. Colin_Welland ( 4_July_1934 – 2_November_2015 ) , born Colin_Edward_Williams , was a_British_actor_and_screenwriter . He won the_Academy_Award for Best_Original_Screenplay for his_script for Chariots of Fire ( 1981_) . He won a_BAFTA_Award for his_performance as the_empathetic_teacher_Mr_Farthing in the_1969_film_Kes .
